messages.title: My Plan for Health in West Cornwall
messages.content: My focus as your MP has been to work with NHS leaders to find ways to provide the health and care you need, when you need it and delivered by the right professional where you need it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working with NHS leaders, focusing on providing necessary healthcare and investments such as £11m for West Cornwall and St Michael’s hospitals, £100m for a Women and Children’s Hospital, £40m for a new oncology unit and other projects at Treliske, £11m adolescent mental health unit in Bodmin, up to £450m for a new hospital and more than £24m boost for Cornwall Council’s social care budget.

issues.health: Investment in West Cornwall and St Michael’s hospitals, Women and Children’s Hospital, new oncology unit, adolescent mental health unit, new hospital, boost for social care budget.

community.content: £24m boost for Cornwall Council’s social care budget

examples: £11m for West Cornwall and St Michael’s hospitals, £100m for a Women and Children’s Hospital, £40m for a new oncology unit, £11m adolescent mental health unit in Bodmin, up to £450m for a new hospital, in excess of a £24m boost for Cornwall Council’s social care budget.
My focus as your MP has been to work with NHS leaders to find ways to provide the health and care you need, when you need it and delivered by the right professional where you need it.
Investment in West Cornwall and St Michael’s hospitals
£100m for a Women and Children’s Hospital, £40m for a new oncology unit, £11m adolescent mental health unit in Bodmin
My focus as your MP has been to work with NHS leaders to find ways to provide the health and care you need, when you need it and delivered by the right professional where you need it.
